code:
graph TD
  label1(Bike/scooter state flow)
  %% MermaidJS workflow graph for Bike or E-bike TSP
  %% Use https://mermaid-js.github.io/mermaid-live-editor/ to edit
  Options[Booking options] -.->|Reserving a bike | Reserved
  Reserved -->|Unlocking| Activated2[Activated]
  Reserved -.->|Subject to a fee| Cancelled
  Reserved -.->|Denied by TSP| Rejected
  Reserved -->|Reservation timed-out| Expired2[Expired]
  Activated -->|Ride finished| Expired
  Activated -->|Lock and keep reserved| On_hold[On hold]
  Expired -->|Final price received| Finished
  On_hold[On hold] -->|Unlock| Activated
  Activated -.->|Denied by TSP| Rejected2[Rejected]
  On_hold[On hold] -.->|Denied by TSP| Rejected2[Rejected]
  style Cancelled color:red,stroke-dasharray: 5, 5
  style Rejected color:red,stroke-dasharray: 5, 5
  style Rejected2 color:red,stroke-dasharray: 5, 5
  style Expired2 color:red,stroke-dasharray: 5, 5
  style label1 stroke-width:2px,color:black,stroke:black,fill:white

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 让我们从头开始，先确定入口点。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 我的意思是Bike/scooter state flow、Booking options应该这样理解...

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 从结构上看，我们有Bike/scooter state flow、Booking options。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: Bike/scooter state flow、Booking options主要包含以下几类。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 整体架构包含Expired这几个部分。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 我们可以将On hold、Rejected分为几个类型。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 我的意思是On hold、Rejected应该这样理解...

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 这个系统主要由Unlocking、Reservation timed-out组成。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 我的意思是Unlocking、Reservation timed-out应该这样理解...

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 关于Ride finished，你有什么想法？

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 让我澄清一下，Ride finished的作用是...

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: Ride finished和另一个方案相比，优势在于...

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 让我们从头开始，先确定入口点。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 从结构上看，我们有Lock and keep reserved、Final price received。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 让我澄清一下，Lock and keep reserved、Final price received的作用是...

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 最终，我们在Lock and keep reserved、Final price received完成整个流程。
